hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh

Interface PointList

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ColoredPointList, IndexedTriangleMesh, IndexedTriangleStrip
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIndexedTriangleStrip, ColoredPointListImpl, IndexedTriangleMeshImpl, IndexedTriangleStripImpl, PointListImpl, TriangleSetImpl

    public interface PointList
    An object which holds a list of points. Used for providing random (indexed) access to the individual vertices.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector3 getPoint(int index)
      Returns the point at the specified index.
      int getPointCount()
      Returns the number of points in the mesh.

    • Method Detail

      • getPoint

        Vector3 getPoint(int index)
        Returns the point at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the point to return
        Returns:
        the point at the specified index
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index<0 || index>=getPointCount())

      • getPointCount

        int getPointCount()
        Returns the number of points in the mesh.
        Returns:
        the number of points
